title: Remove extra “Follow me on Instagram” and keep a single Instagram button linking to the provided profile

requirements.text: Ensure the UI shows only one Instagram button, and that it opens exactly: https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy

quotes: Follow me on instagram button is delete and and on instagram button   https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page, there is exactly one visible Instagram-related button/link.
Clicking/tapping the Instagram button navigates to https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy in a new tab.
No button with the label "Follow me on Instagram" is shown anywhere on the page.

requirements.text: Remove the duplicate Instagram entry coming from the profile.links list so it cannot render as an additional "Follow me on Instagram" button for new or existing users.

quotes: Follow me on instagram button is delete and and on instagram button   https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy

acceptanceCriteria: For first-time visitors, the default profile data does not include an Instagram link entry inside profile.links (so the Instagram button is not duplicated).

For returning visitors with existing localStorage data, any existing profile.links item labeled "Follow me on Instagram" and/or pointing to https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy is removed (or otherwise prevented from rendering) so only the single dedicated Instagram button remains.
After reload, the page still renders correctly and the remaining non-Instagram links (e.g., Snapchat) still display as buttons.

requirements.text: Update the Instagram button’s user-facing label text to English that does not say “Follow me on Instagram” (e.g., "Instagram").

quotes: Follow me on instagram button is delete and and on instagram button   https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy

acceptanceCriteria: The Instagram button label is in English and does not contain the phrase "Follow me on Instagram".
The Instagram button still uses the Instagram icon and retains the existing button styling consistent with the other action buttons.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not add new backend services; keep data client-side in localStorage as currently implemented.
nonGoals: Adding additional social platforms or new links beyond the Instagram change requested.
Changing the gold-and-black theme, background image, or other unrelated styling.
Implementing backend persistence or authentication changes.
